name: Sky Above
description:
They came from the sky above, bringing with them the knowledge for a truly environmentally-friendly world. Once our world began to prosper, they began to harvest. You take up arms and fight back. You will not win. But perhaps you can stall them long enough that we may find a way to survive.

  • Fast-paced arcade FPS
  • Fight spheres from beyond our dimension!
  • Featuring assets by Kenney, sound effects by zapsplat, and music by Alexander Nakarada
